definition: the well-field system of ancient China
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: Coal bed gas parameter well SPMT-1 is located at the Shiping well field, Guxu mining area, South Sichuan Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 1號煤層氣參數井位於川南煤田古敘礦區石屏井田。

sentences.english: If you look closely at the picture, you can see the face of Ida Tarbell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看看圖片密切，你可以看到井田塔貝爾的臉。

sentences.english: Slow fault structure is commonly developed in every mining area or mining well in Longyong Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 緩斷裂構造普遍發育於龍永煤田各個礦區或井田。

sentences.english: Midnight Cowboy appears in the third generation of Doida's dam.
sentences.chinese: 午夜牛郎出現在土井田的大壩第三代。

sentences.english: The Xutuan minefield is situated in southwestern part of Suzhou City, Anhui Province, at the south end of Linhuan mining area.
sentences.chinese: 許疃井田位於安徽省宿州市西南部，臨渙礦區的南端。

sentences.english: The Guanzhai minefield is situated in southern part of the Qianxi County, Guizhou Province, it possesses abundant coal resources.
sentences.chinese: 官寨井田位於貴州省黔西縣南部，含豐富的煤炭資源。

sentences.english: Zhengzhuang Mining Field is a newly-built mine and the mining of its lower coal seams is subjected to the threat of underground water.
sentences.chinese: 成莊井田爲新建礦井，下部煤層開採受地下水的威脅。

sentences.english: Dongshan Coalfield is located in the western part of Niangziguan Spring Area.
sentences.chinese: 東山井田位於娘子關奧陶系岩溶泉域的西部。

sentences.english: Depth of burial is the main factor which influences the gas quantity of Tao No. 2 coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 煤層埋深是陶二井田瓦斯含量的主控因素。

definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
Mita, Sanda, Mitsuda etc (Japanese surname or place name)
plateau, esp. Loess Plateau of northwest China 黃土高原|黄土高原[Huang2 tu3 Gao1 yuan2]
Tienchung town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan/Tanaka (Japanese surname)
Kuantien township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
